extraction.title: [CLOSED] Stale PUBs in 5.4
extraction.description: Issue by jpmens from Tuesday Jan 07, 2014 at 08:28 GMT Originally opened as binarybucks/mqttitude#252Possibly related to #249, #246, and #240Upon opening the app this morning, I noticed the progres bar at bottom was "half full". It drained after a few seconds, and the back-end got this:The first payload is dated yesterday morning (Mon Jan 6 07:53:36 2014)The back-end confirms this (note the ids)
extraction.comments: Comment by ckrey from Wednesday Jan 08, 2014 at 10:47 GMTsame as #249 fixed
